issue.title: [R] Update title in schema.R
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13933](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13933). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The title in the docs for schema() read "Combine and harmonize schemas" but we can only combine but not harmonize schemas, so should update the title to reflect this

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13933?focusedCommentId=17411851) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
That word doesn't mean what I think it means
